name: Indiana Jones and The Relic of the Viking
storyline: While searching the Paris catacombs, a notorious treasure hunter discovers that he has to follow the lead of a Viking raider who came here before him centuries ago.
summary: This free game is a point-n-click adventure game in the style of classic 90's pixel-art games. It takes about 3 hours to complete.
